snippet: Israel has banned the Northern Branch of the Islamic Movement in Israel, a move that denies crucial social services to Arabs living in northern Israel.
abstract: Experts warn that Israel's ban on Northern Branch of Islamic Movement, militant group which also provides critical social services, could backfire; fear driving group underground will fuel its popularity and spur radicalization among Palestinians who depended on its charity services.
lead_paragraph: Israel has banned the Northern Branch of the Islamic Movement in Israel, a move that denies crucial social services to Arabs living in northern Israel.

headline.main: Israel’s Ban of an Islamic Group Carries Risk
headline.print_headline: Some in Israel Question Wisdom of Banning an Islamic Movement and Its Charities
